problem.markdown:
>>Which four data sources are included as built-in options for queries?<<
[x] SharePoint list [x] Hadoop file [x] Active Directory [x] Salesforce Objects [ ] Dynamics NAV reports
[explanation] You cannot use Microsoft Dynamics NAV reports as a data source for Excel queries. [explanation]
problem.p: Which four data sources are included as built-in options for queries?

checkboxgroup.label: Which four data sources are included as built-in options for queries?

div.p: You cannot use Microsoft Dynamics NAV reports as a data source for Excel queries.
